ComicInfo.Title: Eraserophagia; The Eyes Have It; Toodle-oo Caribou
ComicInfo.Summary:
Good grief! Brand-new adventures with classic Charles M. Schulz goodness for the youngest of fans all the way to the biggest of enthusiasts. This collection of stories is truly for all ages and can be enjoyed from the top of the top of the doghouse to the dugout of the baseball field.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Charles M. Schulz (a) & Donna Almendrala (d, c) | 1 | Var | BOOM! Studios Exclusive "Snoopy's Perch" Cover | Charles M. Schulz (a) & Nomi Kane (d) | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-12 16:44:01. [CVDB470490]

ComicInfo.Colorist: Bill Bedard, Lisa Moore, Nina Taylor Kester
ComicInfo.Letterer: Donna Almendrala, Nomi Kane, Steve Wands
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Charles M. Schulz, Donna Almendrala, Nomi Kane
